name: Memories (itch) (ArcticEntertainment)
description:
Memories

This game is a demo for a possible project I want to work on and fully publish. Explore the memories of an old man with dementia. You must enter times from his past and find the memento which helps bring the memory back to life. In the demo you will go into his memory of being a miner and will have to find his pickaxe to help bring back the memory.
